description: Main application component for the Notes Manager UI, orchestrating state, layout, and interactions across different components such as Sidebar, Header, NoteList, Editor, and handling notes via custom hooks.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React functional component serving as the root of the application, managing notes state and rendering the UI.

methods.name: handleNew
methods.description: Creates a new note and sets it as the selected note.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Updates the current selected note with the provided partial data.

methods.name: handleSelect
methods.description: Selects a note by its ID.

methods.name: handleTogglePin
methods.description: Toggles the pinned state of a note.
